contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|Kira|kira}} '''Kira''' may refer to: {{Tocright}} ==People== *[[Kira (given name)]], list of people and characters with this name {{solename}} *[[Kira (German singer)]] (born 1978), stage name of Janine Scholz *[[Kira (Belgian singer)]] (born 1977), stage name of Natasja de Witte *The name given to the person who uploaded the pictures in the [[Edison Chen photo scandal]] ;Fictional characters *[[Kira (Iggy Arbuckle)]], a rat in the animated series ''Iggy Arbuckle'' *[[Kira (Gelfling)]] in the film ''The Dark Crystal'' *[[Kira (Mortal Kombat)]] in the Mortal Kombat universe *Kira, said to be the Swedish goddess of knowledge and wisdom{{citation needed|date=April 2013}} *Kira, the main character of the book ''[[Gathering Blue]]'' by Lois Lowry *Kira, the alias of protagonist [[Light Yagami]] in ''[[Death Note]]'' *Kira, the main character of the book ''[[We The Living]]'' by Ayn Rand *Kira, [[Olivia Newton-John]]'s character in the movie ''[[Xanadu (film)|Xanadu]]'' ==Places== *[[Kira, Aichi]], a town in Japan *[[Kirən]] or Kira, Azerbaijan, a municipality *[[Kira, Burkina Faso]] *[[Kira Ouest]], commune in Mali *[[Kira Town]], a municipality in Uganda *[[Kira (crater)]], a crater on the far side of the moon ==Other uses== *[[Kira (Bhutan)]], the national dress for women in Bhutan *[[Kira Institute]], organization focused on open inquiry in science and other ways of knowing ==See also== *[[Kyra (disambiguation)]] *[[Kira (given name)]] *[[Ciara (given name)]] {{Disambiguation|geo}} [[ko:키라]] [[nl:Kira]] [[pl:Kira]] [[ro:Kira]] [[ru:Кира]] [[sv:Kira]] [[zh:奇拿]]
